https://tmrev.io/movie/359576-Canções do Exílio: A Labareda que Lambeu Tudo 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9M9G1ZsOZXIXTWNefc99RzanVsd.jpg Caetano Veloso, Gilberto Gil, Jards Macalé and Jorge Mautner recall important moments during the military dictatorship the befell in Brazil from 1964 to 1985. The film presents the events of the prison, life in exile and the return to the country. Canções do Exílio: A Labareda que Lambeu Tudo
